lines.text: Apparently his rotten spying bastards are better than my rotten spying bastards!
I hope so, dear boy! It wouldn't be the same without you!

There's lots more to try. The Emperor Tiberius didn't start nibbling little boys until he was well into his seventies. If it would make you happy, I would gladly provide you with a playpen full of toddlers.
And you're mine, my sweet, extended darling.
